sentences.sContent: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.sCn: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.sContent: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.sCn: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

sentences.sContent: ...the relevant authorities should set up favorable regulations to encourage invention...
...moving objects have two characteristics relevant to understanding the dynamics of energy systems: inertia and momentum...
...challenge the tenure system—or all of the above—universities are slowly realizing that to stay competitive and relevant they must adapt to a rapidly changing world...
...We try to make the experience relevant to individual lives...

synos.tran: 有关的；中肯的；有重大作用的

remMethod.val: re(一再) ＋ lev(举) ＋ ant(…的) → 不要一再抬高， 要切题一些 → 切题的

trans.tranOther: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered
